text: Hubbub.co.uk - London - Full time / on site We're looking for an additional front end and back end developer to join our growing team, delivering the best local independent shops to people's doors. Hubbub is backed by various investors including Octopus Ventures, and the co-CEO is William Reeve, an incredibly experienced UK tech entrepreneur (LOVEFiLM, Graze, Secret Escapes, etc). Check out our new website https://beta.hubbub.co.uk or details of how to apply can be found at http://developers.hubbub.co.uk
